name: Æther Shockwave
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Tap all Spirits.
• Tap all non-Spirit creatures.
flavor_text:
"The strain upon the veil between worlds began to show near the end of the Kami War. Strange happenings that neither side could control lashed out across Kamigawa."
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Araba Mothrider
oracle_text: Flying
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"My finest creations are fashioned after the moths of Eiganjo. They fly higher, faster, and more gracefully than any of my own designs."
—Noboru, master kitemaker

name: Celestial Kirin
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, destroy all permanents with that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: All bow at its visitation—some in awe, some in honor, some in fear.

name: Charge Across the Araba
oracle_text: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

name: Cowed by Wisdom
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.

name: Curtain of Light
oracle_text: Cast Curtain of Light only during combat after blockers are declared.
Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Paint gold upon the wind,
Shape the wind into a shield,
And vanish behind the brightness."
—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

name: Descendant of Kiyomaro
oracle_text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Descendant of Kiyomaro gets +1/+2 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain 3 life."
flavor_text: "The blood of Kiyomaro flows in my veins. He did not let Eiganjo fall and neither shall I."

name: Eiganjo Free-Riders
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a white creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"The air filled with dust and the sound of wingbeats. The mothriders had joined the fray."
—Great Battles of Kamigawa

name: Enduring Ideal
oracle_text: Search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

name: Ghost-Lit Redeemer
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Ghost-Lit Redeemer: You gain 4 life.

name: Hail of Arrows
oracle_text: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.
flavor_text:
"Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo."
—General Takeno

name: Hand of Honor
oracle_text: Protection from black
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that brings it to life."

name: Inner-Chamber Guard
oracle_text: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"It seems that each time I visit Lord Konda his guards are more on edge, perhaps even more eager for the war to reach them."
—Masako the Humorless

name: Kataki, War's Wage
oracle_text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {1}."
flavor_text:
"Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes."
—Kenzo the Hardhearted

name: Kitsune Bonesetter
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Activate this ability only if you have more cards in hand than each opponent.
flavor_text:
"He kept generations whole before the Kami War, and now he turns his century of wisdom to healing the latest casualties."
—Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

name: Kitsune Dawnblade
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Kitsune Dawnblade enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

name: Kitsune Loreweaver
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Kitsune Loreweaver gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: "Know your history. The lessons of the past will shield you in times of doubt."

name: Kiyomaro, First to Stand
oracle_text: Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance.
Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.

name: Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker
oracle_text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.
flavor_text:
"Watch over my father. Tell him I'm safe, but I won't come home until I find out how to bring him back to his senses, and Kamigawa is again at peace."
—Michiko Konda, last letter to General Takeno

name: Moonwing Moth
oracle_text: Flying
{W}: Moonwing Moth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Night wings sprinkled with dust
Of a thousand soldiers dead
And a thousand cities fallen."
—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

name: Nikko-Onna
oracle_text: When Nikko-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Nikko-Onna to its owner's hand.

name: Plow Through Reito
oracle_text: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.
flavor_text: The paths of the kami crisscrossed Kamigawa like scars left by a maddened surgeon.

name: Presence of the Wise
oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: "Humbly I bow. Silently I wait. Deeply I listen."

name: Promise of Bunrei
oracle_text: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.
flavor_text: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

name: Pure Intentions
oracle_text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Pure Intentions, return Pure Intentions from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Reverence
oracle_text: Creatures with power 2 or less can't attack you.
flavor_text:
"Despite the massive forces that allied against him, Konda never once believed he would lose the Kami War."
—Masako the Humorless

name: Rune-Tail, Kitsune Ascendant
oracle_text: When you have 30 or more life, flip Rune-Tail, Kitsune Ascendant.

name: Rune-Tail's Essence
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

name: Shinen of Stars' Light
oracle_text: First strike
Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Shinen of Stars' Light: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Spiritual Visit
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Torii Watchward
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Cloudhoof Kirin
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may have target player put the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

name: Cut the Earthly Bond
oracle_text: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Descendant of Soramaro
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: "Soramaro speaks through me. Listen! And I will tell the wisdom of the ancestors."

name: Dreamcatcher
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Be careful where your mind wanders. Even in the quietest moments, the kami are listening, and your thoughts give them shape."
—Lady Azami

name: Erayo, Soratami Ascendant
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever the fourth spell of a turn is cast, flip Erayo, Soratami Ascendant.

name: Erayo's Essence
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts his or her first spell each turn, counter that spell.

name: Eternal Dominion
oracle_text: Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

oracle_text: (Nonexistent mana costs can't be paid.)
Draw a card.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Freed from the Real
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{U}: Tap enchanted creature.
{U}: Untap enchanted creature.
flavor_text: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

name: Ghost-Lit Warder
oracle_text: {3}{U}, {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Channel — {3}{U}, Discard Ghost-Lit Warder: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

name: Ideas Unbound
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Discard three cards at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: The apprentice stared in puzzlement. "But Master, you finished writing those spells just yesterday. Don't you remember?" The jushi's heart froze.

name: Kaho, Minamo Historian
oracle_text: When Kaho, Minamo Historian enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
{X}, {T}: You may cast a card with converted mana cost X exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.

name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
flavor_text:
"He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick."
—Toshiro Umezawa

name: Kiri-Onna
oracle_text: When Kiri-Onna enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kiri-Onna to its owner's hand.

name: Meishin, the Mind Cage
oracle_text: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: It's dangerous indeed to be lost in someone else's thoughts.

name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
oracle_text: Defender
Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
flavor_text: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

name: Moonbow Illusionist
oracle_text: Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

name: Murmurs from Beyond
oracle_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.
flavor_text: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.

name: Oboro Breezecaller
oracle_text: Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Untap target land.
flavor_text:
"I feel their unnatural influence in the weary, weeping land. Do they care nothing for the creatures who walk below their clouds?"
—Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

name: Oboro Envoy
oracle_text: Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

name: Oppressive Will
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: When Minamo was abandoned, its younger students found themselves thrust into a war beyond their skill with talents beyond their control.

name: Overwhelming Intellect
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: "My brain hurts."

name: Rushing-Tide Zubera
oracle_text: When Rushing-Tide Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, draw three cards.
flavor_text: Cut off from the kakuriyo by the destruction of their honden, the zubera sought new ways to bring their secrets home.

name: Sakashima the Impostor
oracle_text: You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is still Sakashima the Impostor, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it gains "{2}{U}{U}: Return Sakashima the Impostor to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."

name: Secretkeeper
oracle_text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Secretkeeper gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor_text: It is all the things that humanity was not meant to know.

name: Shape Stealer
oracle_text: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, change Shape Stealer's base power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Stand back. I know just what to do."
—Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker

name: Shifting Borders
oracle_text: Exchange control of two target lands.

oracle_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by two.
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Some of Minamo's students claimed he was as old as the knowledge he dispensed.

name: Twincast
oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: Sometimes you have to search for inspiration, and sometimes it's right there in front of you.

name: Akuta, Born of Ash
oracle_text: Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may sacrifice a Swamp. If you do, return Akuta, Born of Ash from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Choice of Damnations
oracle_text: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.
flavor_text:
"Life is a series of choices between bad and worse."
—Toshiro Umezawa

name: Death Denied
oracle_text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

name: Death of a Thousand Stings
oracle_text: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Death of a Thousand Stings from your graveyard to your hand.

{2}: Deathknell Kami gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

—Araba patrol survivor

name: Footsteps of the Goryo
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: In the case of violent deaths, kami offered a chance for revenge if the deceased offered up its corpse as a host to the invading kami.

name: Ghost-Lit Stalker

name: Gnat Miser
oracle_text: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.

name: Hand of Cruelty
oracle_text: Protection from white
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that delivers death."

oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that spell's converted mana cost.

{B}, Sacrifice Kagemaro: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: The mist was thick, cloying, and constricting. Shiro fought his way to fresh air only to look back and see his comrades fallen on the battlefield behind him.

name: Kami of Empty Graves
oracle_text: Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Kemuri-Onna
oracle_text: When Kemuri-Onna enters the battlefield, target player discards a card.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kemuri-Onna to its owner's hand.

name: Kiku's Shadow
oracle_text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
flavor_text:
"Me? No, I'm not going to kill you. I won't even lay a finger on you. I promise."
—Kiku, Night's Flower

name: Kuon, Ogre Ascendant

name: Locust Miser

name: Thoughts of Ruin
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a land for each card in your hand.
flavor_text:
"In our war with the kami, we annihilate what is our own. Do they too suffer ruination in their hidden world?"
—Diary of Azusa

name: Undying Flames
oracle_text: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. Undying Flames deals damage to target creature or player equal to that card's converted mana cost.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Yuki-Onna
oracle_text: When Yuki-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Yuki-Onna to its owner's hand.

name: Arashi, the Sky Asunder
oracle_text: {X}{G}, {T}: Arashi, the Sky Asunder deals X damage to target creature with flying.
Channel — {X}{G}{G}, Discard Arashi: Arashi deals X damage to each creature with flying.

name: Ayumi, the Last Visitor
oracle_text: Legendary landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a legendary land.)
flavor_text: Before Shinka's walls were built, before the torii at Okina stood, she was there, tall and proud against the sky, and she will be there long after they have fallen into dust.

name: Bounteous Kirin
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain life equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Even the most benevolent and life-giving of kami joined the war against the mortal world, but only with heavy and sorrowful hearts.

name: Briarknit Kami
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: One thorn to warn, ten thorns to defend, a hundred thorns to destroy.

name: Dense Canopy
oracle_text: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The orochi learned how to move swiftly and surely along the forest floor, like fish darting through gull-watched waters.

name: Descendant of Masumaro
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.

name: Dosan's Oldest Chant
oracle_text: You gain 6 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: As Dosan's chant grew in volume, a second, deeper voice rose up in harmony behind it, strong enough to shake the earth and yet vibrant enough to fill the spirit.

name: Elder Pine of Jukai
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Soulshift 2 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Endless Swarm
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token for each card in your hand.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

name: Fiddlehead Kami
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, regenerate Fiddlehead Kami.
flavor_text:
"Like a riddle, it unwinds.
Like a green wind, it reaches out.
Like a sudden guilt, it seizes."
—Snow Fur, kitsune poet

name: Ghost-Lit Nourisher
oracle_text: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Channel — {3}{G}, Discard Ghost-Lit Nourisher: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Haru-Onna
oracle_text: When Haru-Onna enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Haru-Onna to its owner's hand.

name: Inner Calm, Outer Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: The ghostly objects around the kami circled faster and faster, creating a dizzying cyclone of motion. When it opened its eyes, it struck.

name: Kami of the Tended Garden
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kami of the Tended Garden unless you pay {G}.
Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Kashi-Tribe Elite
oracle_text: Legendary Snakes you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
Whenever Kashi-Tribe Elite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Masumaro, First to Live
oracle_text: Masumaro, First to Live's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text:
"In the waning moments of war, humanity's most ancient ancestors return. But whose side shall they make their own?"
—Isao, Enlightened Bushi

name: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker
oracle_text: Whenever Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
{G}: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

name: Molting Skin
oracle_text: Return Molting Skin to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: "We have learned much from the orochi."

name: Nightsoil Kami
oracle_text: Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Okina Nightwatch
oracle_text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Okina Nightwatch gets +3/+3.
flavor_text: Only the most skilled budoka could protect the Okina Shrine. Only the best of these protectors took the night watch.

name: Promised Kannushi
oracle_text: Soulshift 7 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Reki, the History of Kamigawa
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"After his death, monks spent ten years transcribing the tattoos from Reki's body and gathering stories from those who spoke with him. Thus the volume you hold was written."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Rending Vines
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Draw a card.

name: Sakura-Tribe Scout
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Scouts of the Sakura Tribe spent two years wandering the forest to learn every leaf and tree. That knowledge was called upon during the Kami War to ensure the orochi's survival."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Sasaya, Orochi Ascendant
oracle_text: Reveal your hand: If you have seven or more land cards in your hand, flip Sasaya, Orochi Ascendant.

name: Sasaya's Essence
oracle_text: Whenever a land you control is tapped for mana, for each other land you control with the same name, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

name: Seed the Land
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, its controller creates a 1/1 green Snake creature token.
flavor_text: With a sadness and a sense of hope, Senka left the colony of her birth and, with her attendants, set out to serve as broodmistress, founder of a new colony.

name: Seek the Horizon
oracle_text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"I've seen this great land from every angle. I know its every tree, stone, and river bend. Yet I have come to realize that knowing a thing is not the same as healing it."
—Diary of Azusa

name: Sekki, Seasons' Guide
oracle_text: Sekki, Seasons' Guide enters the battlefield with eight +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Sekki, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Sekki, and create that many 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.
Sacrifice eight Spirits: Return Sekki from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Shinen of Life's Roar
oracle_text: All creatures able to block Shinen of Life's Roar do so.
Channel — {2}{G}{G}, Discard Shinen of Life's Roar: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

name: Stampeding Serow
oracle_text: Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Iname as One
oracle_text: When Iname as One enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a Spirit permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
When Iname as One dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target Spirit permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Ashes of the Fallen
oracle_text: As Ashes of the Fallen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Each creature card in your graveyard has the chosen creature type in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: The ashes of the dead mingle with the soil, and both become as one.

name: Blood Clock
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.
flavor_text: In an age of war, time is measured not by sand but by blood.

name: Ebony Owl Netsuke
oracle_text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has seven or more cards in hand, Ebony Owl Netsuke deals 4 damage to him or her.
flavor_text:
"Owls filled the skies during the Kami War, harbingers of darker times to come."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Ivory Crane Netsuke
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: It is said that the feathers of a crane are clouds, plucked and sewn together by the hands of the kami.

name: Manriki-Gusari
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has "{T}: Destroy target Equipment."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: O-Naginata
oracle_text: O-Naginata can be attached only to a creature with power 3 or greater.
Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Pithing Needle
oracle_text: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

name: Scroll of Origins
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card if you have seven or more cards in hand.
flavor_text: The words from which language sprang, the knowledge from which thought was born, the story from which history was woven.

name: Soratami Cloud Chariot
oracle_text: {2}: Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
{2}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

name: Wine of Blood and Iron
oracle_text: {4}: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. Sacrifice Wine of Blood and Iron at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: Godo never revealed what went into his special brew, but he always had more of it after great victories.

name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.
flavor_text:
"Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed."
—Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

name: Miren, the Moaning Well
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

name: Oboro, Palace in the Clouds
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{1}: Return Oboro, Palace in the Clouds to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Here the soratami wove their endless plots—graceful, artful, and deceitful, while the unwitting world moved below.

name: Tomb of Urami
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Tomb of Urami deals 1 damage to you if you don't control an Ogre.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice all lands you control: Create a legendary 5/5 black Demon Spirit creature token with flying named Urami.
